title: How to manage orders by using sales order software - Quora

response.answer_text: Let me put across like this, the Sales Order is the final stage of any Sales Process. Hence in most of the CRM there is an option of Sales Order Module alongwith the other modules as listed down, • Customers database • Products • Follow-up • Opportunities • Quotation Preparation • Sales order management • Pending Payment status and schedules Sales order will help in Sales, Service, Stores, Finance. Finance team requires the Sales Order data and Customer data to interact with the customers for the status of the materials been received by them and Outstanding dues collection. Stores they would like to have the access for forecasting of the expected business and current order. Moreover the status of the accounts payment received or not, so that the packing & dispatching of the materials can be initiated. Service team requires the SO information for the material received by the clients is in good conditions or not. They also require the information, so scheduling the installation can be done. Sales team no doubt, being the key role players, the complete sales cycle been processed through them in the CRM. Sales Order management, which is the best part of the CRM and providing the sales revenue figure, sales order stages for the post sales process, payment scheduling. Due to the latest technology, CRM solution is very much popular in the market as they provide complete Sales process cycle. Oracle, SAP, Salesforce, SalesBabu, Microsoft Dynamics, many more others who have been providing the CRM – a complete Sales cycle process : Leads Management, Follow ups, Opportunities, Quotations, Sales Orders Management.

Sales order software is a tool that helps you keep your customers happy quickly and efficiently. It includes keeping track of orders and providing proper management of orders. Also, it handles the customer's purchase cycle or its previous order history. It is especially useful when you have a large number of orders to manage. Features of an order management software include: Send invoice, statement, order acknowledgment and quotation in the format of customer's choiceEasily create and copy new orders from existing orders in historyPrinting invoice at customer's choiceCalculating prices based on customer levels, order quantities, special promotions, or customer-specific prices for items.Tracking the sales and returns of a large number of items.Viewing sales order transactions of any situation.Printing the email order acknowledgment form.With the above feature of sales orders software, you can get fast sales order processing, automation of manual processing, quick order information, and get a more integrated form of work. So, in this way, an efficient order management app helps you to manage and track the sales order process. It provides accessibility that helps you manage sales as well as your orders and customer data efficiently. It successfully eliminates redundancy and automates processes.
